@stefanbar @johnfrier @gillianoberholzer @willemhuman @yasserogier @jakovanrensburg 

Are you saying that our systems cannot cope with the amount of people using it at the moment? We have incredibly tight deadlines on these projects to reach certain targets and if the systems cannot cope then we are not going to make it and I would need to report this. Please clarify?

Are there any solutions like load balancing or compartmentalizing groups of users on multiple servers etc...

When you say re-think the architecture of the system, please elaborate what you mean by that?
